name: stripe-mcp
description: Stripe Model Context Protocol server for fraud operations and full API coverage

scripts.build:stdio: smithery build src/index.ts --transport stdio -o .smithery/stdio/index.cjs && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - .smithery/stdio/index.cjs > temp && mv temp .smithery/stdio/index.cjs && chmod +x .smithery/stdio/index.cjs
scripts.build:all: npm run build:stdio && npm run build:shttp
